author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower diverter valve tile tips…I cut the main circular shape using a foam template and diamond hole saw. Then I used a small chamfer cone to polish it, these are also great for enlarging small holes in tile for plumbing penetrations. Then I set the tile and use @Perfectlevelmaster  crosses to get even grout joints 🔥#tileshower #bathroomremodel #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Shower Diverter Valve Tile Tips - #shorts #tileshower #homerepairtutor
